about_the_game:
Story


"In an apartment, "I" begin a life with "Chloe" who has lost her intelligence and memory.

The player begins living with a woman named "Chloe" in a dimly lit apartment.
Chloe" does not seem to know who you are.
Chloe's intelligence is regressed and her memory is hazy.
The player begins an attempt to grow Chloe's intelligence by giving her an intellectual education (command training).

Game System


Command Training SLG
The objective is to give "Chloe" intellectual training (command training) to activate her brain and restore her intelligence.
As "Chloe's" intelligence develops, the novel ADV part will be released.


Novel ADV
In the novel ADV part, one young girl's growth is depicted.

By switching back and forth between the nurturing SLG and the novel ADV, what happened to the decadent "Chloe" is revealed.
It is up to you to decide whether you consider the ED to be a happy ending.

Caution

This game contains representations of character killings, suicides, and regression of intelligence due to external factors.
There may be realistic triggering effects on susceptible players.
Please use caution when purchasing and playing this game.

Story


"In an apartment, "I" begin a life with "Chloe" who has lost her intelligence and memory.

The player begins living with a woman named "Chloe" in a dimly lit apartment.
Chloe" does not seem to know who you are.
Chloe's intelligence is regressed and her memory is hazy.
The player begins an attempt to grow Chloe's intelligence by giving her an intellectual education (command training).

As "Chloe's" intelligence develops, the novel ADV part will be released.

By switching back and forth between the nurturing SLG and the novel ADV, what happened to the decadent "Chloe" is revealed.

movies.name: 『GROWTH EXPERIMENT』オープニングムービー

name: GROWTH EXPERIMENT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10(32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "In a certain apartment room, 'I' began a life with 'Chloe,' who had lost intelligence and memory. By navigating between the present and the past, it becomes clear what happened to the deteriorated 'Chloe.' Whether you interpret the ending as a happy one is entirely up to you."
